Reviews.Title: “Dont stay here if you actually want to get some sleep!”

Reviews.Content: location fairly placed easy access london basic didnt feel particularly clean priced london booking hadnt expected stay overnight worst club outside hotel banging music drunken banter til 6am dont expect sleep fine youre night otherwise stay unless situations nice pub white hart road drury lane cheap excellent breakfast drury lane cafe

Reviews.Title: “People barged in my room twice during my stay, room untidy, they offered to wake me up to catch my plane but they forgot”

Reviews.Content: previously stayed travelodge drury lane heard holborn luckily stayed 2 nights checked system failure fair dont control staff door card knocking middle night woke checked terrified im laughing imagine else stolen money jewelry inside time untidy carpet dirty cold heater effective sleep sweater top linoleum bathroom falling apart basic checkout 4 morning catch plane offered wake forgot luckily alarm managed catch plane im wouldnt reimbursed missed flight
